posts.title: Building Scalable APIs with Spring Boot
posts.excerpt: A deep dive into creating RESTful APIs using Spring Boot, with tips on performance optimization.
posts.content:
In this post, I explore how to build scalable RESTful APIs using Spring Boot. Topics include dependency injection, controller design, and optimizing database queries with JPA.

Key takeaways include using Spring Data JPA for efficient data access and implementing caching to improve performance.

posts.title: Automating CI/CD with GitHub Actions
posts.excerpt: How to set up a CI/CD pipeline for your Java projects using GitHub Actions.
posts.content:
This post covers setting up a CI/CD pipeline for Java projects using GitHub Actions. I walk through creating workflows for automated testing and deployment.

Highlights include configuring Maven builds and deploying to a cloud provider.
